sentences.sContent: She’s a dangerous enemy to have.
Cats and dogs have always been natural enemies.
an old enemy of her father
the unforgettable sight of the president shaking hands with his sworn enemy
sentences.sCn: 董事长与其死敌握手的难忘情景

sentences.sContent: I wouldn’t wishthis on my worst enemy.
sentences.sCn: 即使是我的死对头，我也不愿看到他发生这样的事情。

trans.tranOther: someone who hates you and wants to harm you
